title: Channel Seven Sport : Up There Cazaly [advertisement]
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Advertising
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television advertising
abstract: A television commercial for Channel Seven Sport's coverage of Australian Rules Football.
description: A television commercial for Channel Seven Sport's coverage of Australian Rules Football, using the song 'Up There Cazaly' written by Mike Brady and Peter Sullivan. The song was inspired by the high flying marks of Roy Cazaly who played during the 1920s. The commercial shows some spectacular high marks and bruising bumps. Produced by Campaign Palace.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002462; What's Popular; Active
